name: BitSniper
description: What is the project about? BitSniper is a fully decentralized Chinese esports competitor developed by former Tencent and Ubisoft devs. It is a PvP player shooter game similar to CSGo and Call of Duty (COD) What makes your project unique? Our project delivers high quality graphics, and fast/smooth playability History of your project. Shinobiverse Whatâ€™s next for your project? To finalise the game development and release for public What can your token be used for? In game playability - it allows players to earn as they play, also buy skins and upgrades
